# hunterhodnett.dev

> Hunter Hodnett is a software engineer. This is his personal website featuring his bio, blog posts, and podcast appearances.

## Site Contents

- [Homepage](https://hunterhodnett.dev/): Hero bio, skills, and featured content
- [Blog](https://hunterhodnett.dev/blog/): Technical blog posts and articles
- [Podcasts](https://hunterhodnett.dev/podcasts/): Podcast appearances and interviews

## About Hunter

<!-- TODO: Replace with LinkedIn data -->
Hunter Hodnett is a software engineer based in the United States. He builds software products and writes about technology.
